page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN ASSYNT
page.content: We have in some respects been sheltered from the effects of recession on employment in Assynt. A lot of people have more than one job to rely on. The major employers are the Assynt Estates, Lochinver Fish Selling Company, Highland Stoneware Pottery & various service industries, & shops which operate for both residents & Tourists & Crofting. The dual job syndrome comes about because not all of the jobs can be sustained on a full-time basis. An example of this would be a person, working his croft by day and loading fish at the market in the evening. Many people are forced to work long hours out of economic necessity. The distance from the nearest towns & railheads, makes basic essentials very expensive commodities, and our community is therefore disadvantaged as a result.
